Isotonic regression

biomarker discovery

  • Home
  • works
  • Isotonic regression
1 February 2015

Skills

  • Biomarkers
  • Machine learning
  • Matematica

Summary

In a 4 months internship I contributed to a new project on biomarker screening with a novel classifier based on isotopic regression. The project involved:

  • testing several machine learning algorithms for benchmark
  • improvement of a novel classifier based on isotopic regression
  • working with complex multidimensional data
  • involved in collaboration between experimental and theoretical team
  • created basis for a PhD thesis
  • biomedical: biomarkers detection
  • master thesis evaluation: excellent

Since then, the project was taken over a PhD student and probably evolved significantly. Here is a graphical summary of my work.




Here is my final presentation. Unfortuantely some details are confidential so there were marked as top secret.
